statements: DELETE FROM AgricultureData WHERE region = 'North' AND crop_name = 'Wheat';
DELETE FROM AgricultureData WHERE id = 1 AND region = 'North';
DELETE FROM AgricultureData WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' AND market_price > 20.00;
DELETE FROM MarketPrices WHERE market_location='New York';
DELETE FROM MarketPrices WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' AND price_per_quantity > 10.00
DELETE FROM yields WHERE year = 2022 AND region = 'North';
DELETE FROM yields WHERE crop_id = 1 AND year = 2020 AND region = 'US';
DELETE FROM prices WHERE crop_id = 2 AND year = 2019 AND region = 'Europe';
